https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7Z5FuLTrP5myJ2Dl9VzDRa6q0CG.jpg Ben Crane believes that a severely injured racehorse deserves another chance. He and his daughter Cale adopt the mare and save it from being sacrificed by the owner. Dreamer: Inspired By a True Story
